thread.title: UC’s failure on sexual harassment
thread.title_full: UC’s failure on sexual harassment - San Francisco Chronicle

author: San Francisco Chronicle
title: UC’s failure on sexual harassment
text:
Photo: Paul Chinn, The Chronicle University of California President Janet Napolitano listens to a presentation during the UC Board of Regents meeting at the UCSF Mission Bay campus in San Francisco, Calif. on Wednesday, March 18, 2015. University of California President Janet Napolitano listens to a...
The disastrous handling of a UC Berkeley sex harassment case against a superstar professor is producing a predictable but possibly helpful result. The university is pledging to examine its flawed policies with a full makeover in mind. University of California President Janet Napolitano listens to a presentation during the UC Board of Regents meeting at the UCSF Mission Bay campus in San Francisco, Calif. on Wednesday, March 18, 2015.
